description:
Alex is originally from Colombia. He’s very proud of his South American heritage and has travelled to Colombia many times. He said he would not mind settling down in Puerto Rico one day.
At 25 years old he’s done a lot. He finished college and after that he played professionally for an indoor soccer league.
He loves to play soccer. He said he's addicted!
“So how long have you been playing soccer?”
“Pretty much my whole life. I was born with a soccer ball in my feet... my father played, my two older brothers played.”
“The soccer ball came out first and you came out chasing it?” I joked.
“Pretty much.”
I’ve always loved watching hot guys play soccer. Sometimes they pull their shorts down just enough!
title: Alex
